book.synopsis: Jon-Tom and his otter companion Mudge join the wizard Clothahump in a campaign to protect themselves from an invasion of the insectoid Plated Folk, only to encounter such obstacles as the spider-silk city of the Weavers and their lethally attractive arachnid queen. Reprint.
book.title_long: Spellsinger: Book 2: The Hour of The Gate (The Spellsinger Saga)
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.36 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
